backend/main.mo: Primary backend actor defining storage mixins, access control, and extensive data models for admin users, vehicles, promotions, blog posts, interactions, and comments.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old blog comment records to a new format that supports parentId for threaded comments.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references for recent blog and interaction updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short descriptions summarizing key frontend pages, admin components, hooks, and media tools.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template loading the frontend app, favicon, metadata, and main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/REDEPLOYMENT.md: Guide describing frontend redeployment steps, route validation checklist, and media manager authorization notes.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin routes by checking session state, with an optional emergency bypass.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides the admin dashboard layout with navigation, logout handling, and active-state logic.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: Handles admin session storage, retrieval, migration, clearing, and token helpers.
Enables a temporary authentication bypass for admin access during debugging.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Displays an access-denied message with a button redirecting to the admin login page.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminPageH: Renders a reusable admin page header with title, subtitle, and optional action slot.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: Dialog for creating or editing blog posts with comment moderation controls.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with customizable text.
Generic CRUD table component with optional search, published status, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Media manager UI for listing, searching, and deleting media assets with error handling and confirmation dialogs.
Dialog for browsing, searching, and selecting media assets with error handling and asset preview grid.
Upload button that converts selected files to data URLs and creates media assets via mutation.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Dialog form for creating or editing promotions with fields for text, dates, images, and published status.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Dialog form for creating or editing testimonials, including customer info, review text, rating, image, and publish toggle.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Complex dialog for creating or editing vehicles with tabs for basic info, media, variants, specs, and commercial features.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/C: Editor with checkboxes for toggling commercial vehicle feature flags.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/T: Form for editing technical spec fields and managing a list of additional features.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/V: UI for adding, editing, and deleting vehicle variants and their feature lists.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating admin CMS data such as media, contacts, and credit simulations.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminLoginDe: Empty placeholder module kept for compatibility.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: React hook managing admin session validation, login, and emergency bypass behavior. Handles token storage, validation via backend, and login state tracking.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminLoginDebug: Debug page to manually test admin login calls and display returned tokens or errors. Provides form inputs and result display for troubleshooting authentication.
Main admin login UI using useAdminSession for authentication, with redirects for emergency bypass and existing sessions. Handles login form submission and error display.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Admin profile page allowing viewing and editing of the logged-in adminâ€™s user profile. Loads profile data and saves updates via API mutations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: CRUD management page for blog posts with search, create, edit, and delete actions. Uses CMS query hooks and dialogs to manage blog content.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Admin dashboard summarizing counts of various CMS entities like vehicles, promotions, testimonials, and blog posts. Displays stats in card layout.
Displays and manages contact form leads and credit simulations with search and delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Shows media manager UI with upload capabilities and an auth error alert if the session is invalid.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Lists, searches, creates, edits, and deletes promotions through a CRUD table and form dialog.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Provides CRUD management for testimonials with search filtering and form dialogs.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Manages vehicle entries with category filtering, search, and full CRUD operations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Displays visitor statistics and allows updating stat values through a form.
frontend/src/admin/styles/adminTheme.css: Defines admin-specific CSS variables and themed styles for layout, tables, cards, navigation, and buttons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the application's routing structure with public and admin routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogComment: Form component for creating or replying to blog comments with validation and reset logic.
Renders a threaded comment list with replies and integrated reply forms.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogInterac: Displays like, share, and comment actions for a blog post, tracking local like state.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Contact submission form that validates required fields and posts data using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Form component for submitting credit simulation requests, handling validation, submission, and reset states.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and shows a fallback UI with a refresh option.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying dealer info, contact details, social links, and visitor stats.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Page layout wrapper with navbar, optional hero, main content, CTA section, footer, and visitor tracking.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Mobile bottom bar offering call, WhatsApp, credit form, and navigation menu access.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Slide-up sheet showing navigation menu items for mobile users.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Top navigation bar with links, WhatsApp button, and mobile menu sheet.
frontend/src/components/public/SectionTi: Reusable section title component with an icon and styled heading.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: CTA section prompting users to contact via WhatsApp with a styled message and button.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner displaying a welcome message with themed styling.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Card component showing vehicle image, details, price, features, and links to detail or consultation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating vehicles, blogs, interactions, and visitor stats using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Tracks unique visitors and page views using mutations and sessionStorage flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup and theme variables for light and dark UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with likes, shares, views, comments, and SEO updates.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Lists all blog posts with preview cards and links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Shows detailed info for a commercial vehicle with interactions like liking and sharing.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Lists commercial vehicles, grouping them into light, medium, and tractor categories and rendering VehicleCards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form, contact details, location map, and sales consultant info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing featured vehicles, CTA banner, about section, vehicle search, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Shows detailed info for a passenger vehicle including variants, pricing, interactions, and sharing/liking features.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Lists all published passenger vehicles with a grid of VehicleCards.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Displays a list of active promotions with images, descriptions, validity dates, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Renders customer testimonials with ratings, profile info, and review text.
frontend/src/redeploy/routeSmoke.ts: Defines public and admin routes for smoke testing and provides helpers for generating checklists and validating router config.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration setting dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, architecture notes, known issues, and configuration metadata for the automotive website project.
